annotation.comment: Height-constrained geodetic latitude of the pixel. Units are in degrees north of the equator.
Height-constrained geodetic longitude of the pixel. Positive=degrees east of the Greenwich meridian. Negative=degrees west of the Greenwich meridian.
Height-constrained height of the pixel above the reference ellipsoid.

annotation.long_name: identifier of the associated prior river reach
annotation.comment: Unique reach identifier from the prior river database. The format of the identifier is CBBBBBRRRRT, where C=continent, B=basin, R=reach, T=type.

annotation.long_name: identifier of the associated prior river node
annotation.comment: Unique node identifier from the prior river database. The format of the identifier is CBBBBBRRRRNNNT, where C=continent, B=basin, R=reach, N=node, T=type of water body.

annotation.long_name: identifier of the associated prior lake
annotation.comment: Identifier of the lake from the lake prior database) associated to the pixel. The format of the identifier is CBBNNNNNNT, where C=continent, B=basin, N=counter within the basin, T=type of water body.

Tile-specific identifier of the observed feature associated to the pixel. The format of the identifier is CBBTTTSNNNNNN, where C=continent, B=basin, T=tile number, S=swath side, N=lake counter within the PIXC tile.

Climatological ice cover flag indicating whether the pixel is ice-covered on the day of the observation based on external climatological information (not the SWOT measurement). Values of 0, 1, and 2 indicate that the surface is not ice covered, partially ice covered, and fully ice covered, respectively. A value of 255 indicates that this flag is not available.

Dynamic ice cover flag indicating whether the pixel is ice-covered on the day of the observation based on analysis of external satellite optical data. Values of 0, 1, and 2 indicate that the surface is not ice covered, partially ice covered, and fully ice covered, respectively. A value of 255 indicates that this flag is not available.

annotation.description: NetCDF-4 conventions adopted in this product. This attribute should be set to CF-1.7 to indicate that the product is compliant with the Climate and Forecast NetCDF conventions.
Level 2 KaRIn high rate pixel cloud vector attribute product
Name of producing agency.

The method of production of the original data. If it was model-generated, source should name the model and its version, as specifically as could be useful. If it is observational, source should characterize it (e.g., 'Ka-band radar interferometer').
UTC time when file generated. Format is: 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss : Creation'
Published or web-based references that describe the data or methods used to product it. Provides version number of software generating product.
Contact information for producer of product. (e.g., 'ops@jpl.nasa.gov').
Cycle number of the product granule.
Pass number of the product granule.
Tile number in the pass of the product granule.
'L' or 'R' to indicate left and right swath, respectively.

Tile name using format PPP_TTTS, where PPP is a 3 digit pass number with leading zeros, TTT is a 3 digit tile number within the pass, and S is a character 'L' or 'R' for the left and right swath, respectively.
Continents the product belongs to. If the tile belongs to more than one continent, all continents are listed, separated by a semi-column.
UTC time of first measurement. Format is: YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.ssssssZ
UTC time of last measurement. Format is: YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.ssssssZ
Westernmost longitude (deg) of granule bounding box
Easternmost longitude (deg) of granule bounding box
Southernmost latitude (deg) of granule bounding box
Northernmost latitude (deg) of granule bounding box
Nominal swath corner longitude for the first range line and inner part of the swath (degrees_east)
Nominal swath corner latitude for the first range line and inner part of the swath (degrees_north)
Nominal swath corner longitude for the last range line and inner part of the swath (degrees_east)
Nominal swath corner latitude for the last range line and inner part of the swath (degrees_north)
Nominal swath corner longitude for the first range line and outer part of the swath (degrees_east)
Nominal swath corner latitude for the first range line and outer part of the swath (degrees_north)
Nominal swath corner longitude for the last range line and outer part of the swath (degrees_east)
Nominal swath corner latitude for the last range line and outer part of the swath (degrees_north)
Water mask pixel cloud file used to generate data in product.
Pixel cloud vector attribute river file used to generate data in product.
Name of static river a priori database file used to generate data in product.
Name of static lake a priori database file used to generate data in product.
Name of PGE_L2_HR_LakeTile configuration parameters file.
Semi-major axis of reference ellipsoid in meters.
Flattening of reference ellipsoid
